infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: For AWS provider < v4.0.0, add `logging` block attribute. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add `aws_s3_bucket_logging` resource.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Enabling server access logging provides detailed records for the requests that are made to a S3 bucket. This information is useful for security and compliance auditing purposes.

remediation.terraform: For AWS provider < v4.0.0, add `logging` block attribute. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add `aws_s3_bucket_logging` resource.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set the `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` or `aws_s3_account_public_access_block` `restrict_public_buckets` field to `true`.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: If a public policy is attached to the bucket, anyone will be able to read and/or write to the bucket.

remediation.terraform: Set the `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` or `aws_s3_account_public_access_block` `restrict_public_buckets` field to `true`.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set the `aws_s3_bucket` `versioning` block `mfa_delete` field to `true`.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: S3 bucket will not enforce MFA login on delete requests.

remediation.terraform: Set the `aws_s3_bucket` `versioning` block `mfa_delete` field to `true`.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Configure the `aws_s3_bucket` `policy` field or the `aws_s3_bucket_policy` with a valid action, effect, and condition.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: To protect data in transit, an S3 bucket policy should deny all HTTP requests to its objects and allow only HTTPS requests. HTTPS uses Transport Layer Security (TLS) to encrypt data, which preserves integrity and prevents tampering.

remediation.terraform: Configure the `aws_s3_bucket` `policy` field or the `aws_s3_bucket_policy` with a valid action, effect, and condition.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: If a public ACL is attached to the bucket, anyone will be able to read and/or write to the bucket.

remediation.terraform: Set the `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` or `aws_s3_account_public_access_block` `ignore_public_acls` field to `true`.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set the `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` or `aws_s3_account_public_access_block` `block_public_policy` field to `true`.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Anyone who can manage the bucket's policies will be able to grant public access to the bucket.

remediation.terraform: Set the `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` or `aws_s3_account_public_access_block` `block_public_policy` field to `true`.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Configure an `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` for each bucket, or configure an `aws_s3_account_public_access_block` to enable block public access settings at the account level.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: AWS's S3 Block Public Access feature has four settings: BlockPublicAcls, IgnorePublicAcls, BlockPublicPolicy, and RestrictPublicBuckets. All four settings should be enabled to help prevent the risk of a data breach.

remediation.terraform: Configure an `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` for each bucket, or configure an `aws_s3_account_public_access_block` to enable block public access settings at the account level.

iacDescription.resolve: Configure an `aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block` for each bucket, or configure an `aws_s3_account_public_access_block` to enable block public access settings at the account level.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Configure the `aws_cloudtrail` `event_selector` block with appropriate settings.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Object-level S3 events (GetObject, DeleteObject, and PutObject) are not logged by default, though this is recommended from a security best practices perspective for buckets that contain sensitive data.

remediation.terraform: Configure the `aws_cloudtrail` `event_selector` block with appropriate settings.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: In the `aws_s3_bucket`, define a `rule` in the `server_side_encryption_configuration` block.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Enabling server-side encryption (SSE) on S3 buckets at the object level protects data at rest and helps prevent the breach of sensitive information assets. Objects can be encrypted with S3 Managed Keys (SSE-S3), KMS Managed Keys (SSE-KMS), or Customer Provided Keys (SSE-C).

remediation.terraform: In the `aws_s3_bucket`, define a `rule` in the `server_side_encryption_configuration` block.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: S3 bucket is not encrypted

iacDescription.resolve: In the `aws_s3_bucket`, define a `rule` in the `server_side_encryption_configuration` block.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Configure a `replication_configuration` block that specifies an IAM role for replicating objects and rules managing the replication.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Cross-Region S3 replication can help with meeting compliance requirements, minimizing latency, and increasing operational efficiency. Same-Region S3 replication can help with aggregating logs and compliance with data sovereignty laws.

remediation.terraform: Configure a `replication_configuration` block that specifies an IAM role for replicating objects and rules managing the replication.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: S3 bucket replication (cross-region or same-region) is not enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: S3 bucket replication (cross-region or same-region) is not enabled

iacDescription.issue: S3 bucket replication (cross-region or same-region) is not enabled
iacDescription.impact: Cross-Region S3 replication can help with meeting compliance requirements, minimizing latency, and increasing operational efficiency. Same-Region S3 replication can help with aggregating logs and compliance with data sovereignty laws.
iacDescription.resolve: Configure a `replication_configuration` block that specifies an IAM role for replicating objects and rules managing the replication.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.description: Cross-Region S3 replication can help with meeting compliance requirements, minimizing latency, and increasing operational efficiency. Same-Region S3 replication can help with aggregating logs and compliance with data sovereignty laws.
